title: I need to find this font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013238im_/http:/typophile.com/files/astre_5249.jpg)

it shouldn't be difficult to find, please help me!
author: il berti

comments.content: Reminds me a lot of [Kabel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013238/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/kabel) Ultra...
it's very similar, geometric 231 heavy is more similar but not equal...

You're right. Even if Geometric 231 is Bistream version of Kabel ITC, they remain slightly different, mainly /r leg finial angle, straight for BT Heavy (or Adobe/Linotype Black) and oblique for (original) ITC.  
But still no chance with this single storey /a... Borrowed from another font? Futura?
